item.description:
Hello, I know this amazing world renowned sculptress, Susan Clinard, who's having an opening for her new show at the Marsh Gardens (www.yale.edu/marshgardens). In the midst of the Marsh Garden's beautiful greenhouses, while live jazz is playing, her work will be shown. The show is 5:30pm to 9pm (though I don't know how long I'll personally stay) The show itself runs through Dec 14th, but I thought it would be fun to go to the opening. Let me know your thoughts! You can check out her art at www.clinard.org

Devorah is your contact: 203-314-4329

The Marsh Gardens can be kind of confusing if you've never been there (though I've only been there once!). There's nothing really near there, like a cafe, to meet at - but I can be at the corner of Edwards and Prospect from 5:20 to 5:40 if people would like to walk over together.

I don't anticipate it being such a large show that we wouldn't see one another. If I'm not there and it's after 6:15, that means I've probably already left - but stay and enjoy the art!
item.name: Clinard Sculpture Show Opening
